lines: 1. 'Mbura netwe korwa lgoro,Neira y'obwanchani;Eyekomenta chinguru,chikorw' as'Omotoria.
Mbura y'ebisio,nero ntwe toganetie;Nonya gwatoir'amabera,ko nembura twasaba.
2. "Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"Ekobokia chinkoro;'S'amagoko n'ebitunwa,'riogi ri'embur'enyinge.
3. "Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"'Monene toyetwerie;Erio tonyore chinguru,Oikeranie eira.
4. "Mbura netwe korwa Igoro"Tagototweria rero!Twatore amamoch'aito,Tokorangerie Yeso.
